features.name: Navigation System

features.description: Main landing section with headline, CTA button, and 3D isometric cylinder graphics

features.description: Company introduction with abstract S-shape graphics and call-to-action

features.name: Services Showcase

features.name: Testimonials Section
features.description: Client testimonials with video thumbnail placeholders and testimonial cards

features.name: Build Team Section
features.description: Section explaining team building capabilities with bullet points and circuit board graphics

features.name: Why Suryonex Section
features.description: Section highlighting company differentiators with bullet points

features.name: Security Protocols
features.description: Security information section with isometric cube graphics and security features list

features.name: Statistics Display
features.description: Three-column stats section showing accuracy, savings, and operations metrics

features.name: Call-to-Action Section
features.description: Final CTA section with buttons for getting started and calling

features.name: Footer Component
features.description: Comprehensive footer with links, contact information, partner logos, and floating CTA button

features.name: SVG Icons Library

features.name: Routing System
